title: PC March 28 - War at the University and the University of War. A document from the University Collective of Venice Li.S.C.
content:
The reaction of this government in the face of the legitimate expression of dissent by students and university students in against a state that is currently perpetrating a genocide In Palestine, he demonstrates his more unequivocal way fascist nature, well beyond rhetoric, which aims to repress any type of dissent that threatens its economic interests e geopolitics.

The student disputes of these weeks In fact, they are narrated as "antechamber of terrorism in Italy", until the at least imaginative "infiltrations of the Red brigades inside universities ". This goes to legitimize the militarized repression implemented against protests within universities, places of knowledge that abdicate their critical role towards what is happening, and protecting students and students. From Naples to Bologna, from Pisa to Venice and Turin, in a space that by nature it should be the first to allow and encourage expression of opinions and critical readings of the reality that surrounds us, the Student protests had to face the manganelli like response to dissent, which instead sought a dialogue.

For example is what happened at the University Federico II of Naples when, following the protests for the

presence of the director of the newspaper "La Repubblica" Maurizio Molinari, as an accomplice of the massacre, the minister Lollobrigida agriculture has imaginatively argued that the disputes were comparable to the political climax that brought to the killing of Aldo Moro and defining them terrorist, with a Great effort of imagination. This immense alarmism paints a clear image: the image of a government that, paradoxically wearing the mask of the defender of democracy, he proves terrified by dissent, especially youthful and above all when concerning the genocide taking place in Palestine.

On the basis of these fallacious pretexts, the minister Planted did not hesitate to process a shameful access plan "Limited and controlled" to the universities, which in fact would foresee as a standard the presence of law enforcement agencies to the entrances of the classrooms where conferences and appointments are held, with the explicit purpose of repressing any dispute. Given that the accusations of terrorism, which this government launches with a lightness disconcerting, they should remain in the pocket to those who make themselves accomplice of the genocide perpetrated by Israel, the pretext of these senseless comparisons that Lollobrigida Azzarda is clear, and Mal I dismantle yet another attempt to impose a turn of lives securitarian and detective that suffocates dissent, armoring one of the Rich in critical stimuli.

Universities, in this political panorama that more and more anguished assumes openly fascist connotations, lend the side to the progressive tightening of brutality police and repression of dissent. Even where they come Reached victories, as happened in Turin with the retreat of the University from the Maeci of collaboration Italy-Israel, the controversy flock, even by professors, against the governance and students, accused of being anti -Semitic and carriers of hatred.

In Venice, the Ca 'Foscari University shows a conniving attitude, when not directly complicit, approximately The militarization of its spaces and the warfounding propaganda proposed to his students, when he "boasts" a belonging rector part of Med.or[1]

We refuse to suffer this progressive militarization in silence, we will not let violence instigated by a government frightened by dissent suffocates our voices and the our claims, which ask for the end of a genocide.
